name: wpNoPin
author: Stephan Gerlach

sections.description:
wpNoPin adds the meta tag in order to block http://www.pinterest.com

You can switch this on and off for the entire site.

If you have it switched off you can block single pages or posts from pinterest.com
sections.installation:
1. Upload index.php to the /wp-content/plugins/wpNoPin directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

* or 1. Search for wpnopin via Plugins – Add New in the admin area 2. Click on Install 3. Activate plugin
sections.faq:
Why do I need this plugin?

If you have content that you don’t want to appear on pinterest.com this plugin lets you block pinterest from accessing your content.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • fixed small error in html layout
  • added function to block single page or post

1.0

  • Initial release

short_description: Protect your content and block pinterest.com
